item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260108.3)
item.description:
What's New

Refactor injection method detection with confirmed method caching

  • Add confirmed injection method mechanism in AppBehaviorDetector

- Cache injection method after mouse click/app switch detection

- Use cached method for subsequent keystrokes to avoid repeated AX API calls

- Improve performance and avoid AX API timing issues

  • Implement 3x retry detection for mouse click events (0.15s interval)

- Handle AX API timing issues when clicking while Spotlight is visible

- Fix false positive overlay detection

- Apply best available method at each retry attempt

  • Simplify CharacterInjector by using confirmed method from AppBehaviorDetector

- Remove local cache in favor of centralized confirmed method

- Delegate cache clearing to AppBehaviorDetector

  • Remove browser-specific checks from OverlayAppDetector

- Timing issues now handled by retry logic in AppDelegate

- Cleaner and more maintainable code

  • Bump build version to 20260108.3
